name: Obstacle Avoidance Bot
detail: Robot senses obstacles, auto-navigates, and avoids collisions by changing direction autonomously.

name: Line Follower Bot
detail: Automated robot follows visual line on surface for autonomous navigation.

name: Bluetooth Controlled Bot
detail: Bluetooth robot controlled by Android, with gesture, obstacle, and RF capabilities.

name: Laser Writing
detail: Precision writing method using laser for accurate and intricate applications.

name: Gesture Controlled Bot
detail: Hand-gesture controls guide a robot through a compact accelerometer-equipped transmitter.
